title: The Courtship of Eddie's Father
overview: The Courtship of Eddie's Father is an American television sitcom based on the 1963 movie of the same name, which was based on a novel by Mark Toby (edited by Dorothy Wilson).The series is about a widower, Tom Corbett, who is a magazine publisher, and his young son, Eddie. Eddie believes his father should remarry, and manipulates situations surrounding the women his father is interested in.
